data.name: LIV StreamerKit
data.detailed_description:
LIV StreamerKit is a utility application for SteamVR is fully compatible with any SteamVR headset. It was built to be highly performant

StreamerKit brings your VR livestream chats & alerts into your VR headset.

Compatibility

We currently only support Twitch as a platform, and StreamLabs as an alerts provider. We'll be adding support to more platforms (Facebook+YouTube), and alerts providers (StreamElements).

Chat Controls

You can set your chat to be attached to one of your hands, or to follow your head movement. You can change the smoothing and how the chat window follows your head.

More controls to be added.

Chat Controls

Alerts always show up in your main view. You can filter our alerts you don't want (ex: don't show follower alerts).

More behaviors to be added.

Why we built it

We built LIV StreamerKit because we needed a lean and CPU/GPU efficient solution, and because we need in-VR controls for some of the other LIV features that we have coming soon, including and not limited to: scene controls in OBS, voice controls for our spectator cameras and a VR iron-man like HUD for your live streaming needs.

data.short_description: LIV StreamerKit is a Utility Application for SteamVR that brings your VR livestream chats & alerts into your VR headset. It is fully compatible with any SteamVR headset, and is highly performant.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
